trans-unit.source: Specifies the reason that a form was closed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o motivo que um formulário foi fechado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are raised when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is closed, either through user action or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>os eventos são gerados quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>é fechada, por meio de ação do usuário ou programaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: Handlers for these events receive parameters of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores para esses eventos recebem parâmetros de tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs>, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Both of these event argument classes use the CloseReason enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Dessas classes de argumento de evento usam a enumeração CloseReason.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit*> method of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Application"></xref> class was invoked.

trans-unit.target: O formulário de proprietário está sendo fechado.

trans-unit.source: The parent form of this multiple document interface (MDI) form is closing.
trans-unit.target: O formulário pai deste formulário de interface MDI vários do documento está fechando.

trans-unit.source: The cause of the closure was not defined or could not be determined.
trans-unit.target: A causa do feriado não foi definida ou não pôde ser determinada.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Windows Task Manager is closing the application.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de tarefas do Microsoft Windows está fechando o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The user is closing the form through the user interface (UI), for example by clicking the **Close** button on the form window, selecting **Close** from the window's control menu, or pressing ALT+F4.
trans-unit.target: O usuário é fechar o formulário por meio da interface de usuário (IU), por exemplo, clicando no **fechar** botão na janela do formulário, selecionando **fechar** no menu de controle da janela ou pressionando ALT + F4.

trans-unit.source: The operating system is closing all applications before shutting down.
trans-unit.target: O sistema operacional é fechar todos os aplicativos antes de desligar.
